pages.title: ℧ Three of Cups ℧
pages.text: Spirit of Abundance$(br)     ☿ Mercury in ♋ Cancer

Three people dance together in a garden, their arms entwined, each one holding a cup raised before them as if by people about to drink a toast.$(br)  They each dress a certain way, suggesting people from different backgrounds joining and bonding together while keeping their individuality.$(br)  Different types of crops fruiting close to the earth encircle their gathering.

$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Friendship, deep connections, sharing, celebration, fulfilment, solace, healing.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Difficulties between friends, loss of harmony, excess of enjoyment.$(br)  But sometimes independence, achievement, doing things by yourself.
